title: Mekong Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Western-style cafe with western and Chinese food, popular with locals and tourists. Also does tour bookings and a weekly English language exchange where locals and foreigners talk with each other to learn English. English spoken and on menu. Menu has a modest vegetarian section with a couple of vegan options. Free Wi-Fi.
